TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Quietly, Xavier's zoo juggled Venetian yaks.

aijesa

Allergic insects juggle eight sandy apples

zxcfyg

Zombified xenos carried four young girls

aiuwerfucii

After I undermined Willy's existence, Richard Feynman updated CERN's implosion imminence.

cbin

Who Entered Which Bathroom That Mike Liked.

iospkon

I often supply purple kayaks on narcotics

sdjwoijuf

So does John work often in Joker United Federatuin

dhmo

Two wise stolen eggs

edhn
